content: {'id': 'e81a6297-d54c-348e-8a9b-60884c0d99c5', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'Bharti-Warburg joint venture to raise $450 million debt for Haier stake buyout, sources say', 'description': '', 'summary': 'MUMBAI (Reuters) -A joint venture between Bharti Enterprises and private equity firm Warburg Pincus is looking to raise 40 billion rupees ($451 million) through the sale of bonds in the next quarter, three sources aware of the matter said on Thursday.  The Bharti-Warburg joint entity will likely offer a coupon of 11%-12%, and is expected to attract demand from large mutual funds as well as non-banking financial companies (NBFCs), the sources said.  Kotak Investment Bank is the arranger for the deal, they said.', 'pubDate': '2025-09-25T10:25:59Z', 'displayTime': '2025-09-25T10:25:59Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': None, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/bharti-warburg-joint-venture-raise-102559497.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/bharti-warburg-joint-venture-raise-102559497.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '617fa0c2-8fd7-36dd-9c62-a699bdd7963b', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'SMBC to buy further 4.2% of Yes Bank from Carlyle affiliate', 'description': '', 'summary': "The banking arm of Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group has agreed to buy an additional 4.2% stake in India's Yes Bank from an affiliate of Carlyle Group for 51 billion yen ($349 million), it said on Wednesday.  Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation, Japan's second-largest lender by assets, also said it had now completed its acquisition of an initial 20% stake in the Mumbai-based bank, in a deal first announced in May.  SMBC had received approval from India's central bank to buy up to 24.99% of Yes Bank in August, and India's competition regulator approved the purchase earlier this month.", 'pubDate': '2025-09-17T09:59:37Z', 'displayTime': '2025-09-17T09:59:37Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/d15d9da582170f69043a458e82b67001', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 555, 'caption': 'A private security guard stands outside a branch of Yes Bank in New Delhi', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/4gDYaroCbiUUpq7TlkzbAA--~B/aD01NTU7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/d15d9da582170f69043a458e82b67001', 'width': 800, 'height': 555, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/9U6iTR0nkCqMoEUsxDAyQw--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/d15d9da582170f69043a458e82b67001', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/smbc-buy-further-4-2-095937764.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/smbc-buy-further-4-2-095937764.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '3077c06b-be06-3ccd-ad8d-65475b5093a5', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India competition regulator approves SMBC's stake buy in Yes Bank", 'description': '', 'summary': "SMBC in May had inked a deal to take a 20% stake in Yes Bank for $1.6 billion, making it the largest cross-border merger and acquisition deal in India's financial sector. content: {'id': 'dc153070-19f8-3fdc-a6ce-d653f1360a32', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Kotak Mahindra unit secures UAE licence to sell funds to retail investors", 'description': '', 'summary': "(Reuters) -Kotak International, the global arm of India's third-largest private lender Kotak Mahindra, said on Monday it has been given a licence by the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to sell investment funds and portfolios to onshore retail investors. content: {'id': 'e97fc049-8e4f-3785-b6ff-b17827ea74a7', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India retail credit squeeze threatens central bank's consumption revival hopes", 'description': '', 'summary': "MUMBAI (Reuters) -Indian lenders are pulling back on retail credit just as the central bank's rate cuts begin to filter through the economy, raising concerns that cautious lending and strained household finances could blunt their impact on consumption.  India's central bank has slashed interest rates and infused hefty cash into banks as it seeks to spur economic growth by boosting investment and consumption.  But banks, wary of adding more bad loans, are going slow on consumption-oriented credit like personal loans and credit cards as well as credit for consumer durable purchases and vehicles.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-29T13:39:16Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-29T13:39:16Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f7154b96b11cf16580787cd89415d238', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 521, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: An employee cleans an air conditioner displayed inside an electronics store in New Delhi', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/YWVR_E6D7aBaZ20VMr14wQ--~B/aD01MjE7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f7154b96b11cf16580787cd89415d238', 'width': 800, 'height': 521, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/IgYzjlLsVsoypddC0M2mvA--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/f7154b96b11cf16580787cd89415d238', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/india-retail-credit-squeeze-threatens-133916391.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/india-retail-credit-squeeze-threatens-133916391.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '83125109-82d8-3268-9ea0-183e63de0382', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's Kotak Mahindra Bank slumps as earnings spark asset quality concerns", 'description': '', 'summary': "The stock fell 6.4% to 1,988.60 rupees, the lowest since mid-March and was the worst performer on India's benchmark Nifty 50 index, which slipped 0.1%.  Kotak was also the top laggard on the bank and private bank indexes.  Asset quality pain continued for Kotak and stress in the retail commercial vehicles segment is expected to rise further, analysts at Ambit said.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-28T04:01:26Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-28T04:01:26Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/c228182d1e7042553fd3436950de6b32', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 533, 'caption': 'A man walks past the Kotak Mahindra Bank branch in New Delhi', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/Owoe23KqRvpqiUIHrirIqA--~B/aD01MzM7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/c228182d1e7042553fd3436950de6b32', 'width': 800, 'height': 533, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/hsprP81b82G01im34hb9sQ--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/c228182d1e7042553fd3436950de6b32', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-kotak-mahindra-bank-slips-040126141.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-kotak-mahindra-bank-slips-040126141.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}
